comments: Perfect for work! yeaaah. Smooooooth stuff
saw Albert & his dancing girls at the shrine auditorium in 1970, what a great show!!

He is a soulful and energetic performer who brings the best of what people love about music together in one total package: great stage presence and quality sound. His guitar is powerful and inviting in a way that makes you want to hear more. He also has the ability to create an exciting atmosphere anywhere. He can deliver his message on a broadly appealing level with a sincerity that comes through every note and every word.

Lots of people appreciated them; just not the ones that society takes notice of. Every Friday and Saturday nite in juke joints across the US people that work hard for a living spent their hard-earned money to laugh and dance and drink and have a good time... and they don't give a shit if you know about it or not.
It always amazes me that these old blues legends were living in the time that nobody appreciated them until they were dead.
